PPI::Token::Number::Binary(3) User Contributed Perl Documentation PPI::Token::Number::Binary(3)

NAME

PPI::Token::Number::Binary - Token class for a binary number

SYNOPSIS

  $n = 0b1110011;  # binary integer

INHERITANCE

  PPI::Token::Number::Binary
  isa PPI::Token::Number
      isa PPI::Token
          isa PPI::Element

DESCRIPTION

The "PPI::Token::Number::Binary" class is used for tokens that represent base-2 numbers.

METHODS

base

Returns the base for the number: 2.

literal

Return the numeric value of this token.

SUPPORT

See the support section in the main module.
